inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin't. / No. 62. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Published Nov'r 1st 1774 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. title: Peasants Driving Cattle
